title: I Got LeaveBuster for internet issues
body:
I was just playing a game in ranked where out of nowhere the Trying to reconnect appear. I have never really had internet issues in the past and have a stable 30 ping. I got a 5 game leavebuster and a demotion. This is now making it really hard to get any elo at all and im probably gonna qut this game now. riot doesnt care about players at all. i report ever troll and toxic person but they never get banned, and i get banned for something 100% out of my control. 
fuck riot

replies.body: Just happened to me bro as well. Bloody annoying
